attributes.action: Make the Grade boundries for the 2018 GCSE exams lower
attributes.background: Candidates are struggling with the thought that only 1% of them will achieve a grade 9 (the highest grade),why would you want to make it harder that it al ready is?

rejection.details:
Grade boundaries aren't decided by the Government or Parliament. They are set by exam boards.

You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/gcse-and-a-level-exams-how-marking-and-grading-works
